text: Stanley Price (12 August 1931 - 28 February 2019) was a British novelist and playwright. He wrote for the theatre, movie and television. He was born in London. Price was known for writing the screenplays for Arabesque, Gold and Shout at the Devil. For television, he wrote A Royal Scandal. Price was born in London. Price died on 28 February 2019 in London at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:British novelists Category:British playwrights Category:British screenwriters Category:British television writers Category:Writers from London
title: Stanley Price (writer)
